name: FISH 4 LIFE
description:
Keep track of your fuel level. You will pay full tank double price if you are ran out of fuel. You can fulfil your fuel level at green gas stations. 

Make money. Sell fish in shops. There are 2 color stocks which accept fish of appropriate color and one universal shop.

Avoid sharks. You are safety in "safe areas" close to the island. Sharks are not able to attack you there.
